title: 15 Postive Factors
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"What is the third smallest positive integer with exactly 15 positive integer factors?"}]}]}

title: 15 Puzzle

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\left| { e }^{ A } \right| ={ e }^{ Tr(A) } "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" we get 
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\lfloor \left| e^A \right| \rfloor = \lfloor e^{1+6+11+0} \rfloor "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" which by calculator computation is "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \boxed { 65659969. }  "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"
